function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 due to increased contagion","Impact":"High mortality and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing travel restrictions, promoting hygiene practices, and developing vaccines","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, telemedicine, and data analytics for monitoring outbreaks","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and travelers","Owner":"Government health agencies, international organizations, and healthcare institutions"}]}
